    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlarmSounds
    The AlarmSounds class manages alarm sound sequences.
    AppTest
    Unit test for simple App.
    DisplayMessages
    The DisplayMessages class provides methods to display error messages using a graphical user interface (GUI) dialog box.
    Notifications
    The Notifications class represents a system tray notification configuration.
    PlaySounds
    The PlaySounds class provides functionality to play sound files from the resources folder.
    SystemTrayNotification
    This class handles the creation of a system tray notification with customizable options.
